ownership.description: OWN_BUY, OWN_SELL - the leg (order) is placed by current user and is on Buy or Sell side, respectively. COMPANY_BUY, COMPANY_SELL - the order was placed by different user from same Company.Order is on Buy or Sell side, respectively. OTHER - the order was placed by different company than user's.

deliveryAreaId.description: Delivery area Id of the order.

aggressor.description: true if leg is the aggressor, null if the information is unavailable (for XBID trades)

updatedAt.description: The timestamp at which this trade was updated (in case of trade cancellation).

tradeTime.description: The timestamp when the trade was created.

state.description: COMPLETED - the trade is completed, CANCELLED - the trade is cancelled.

legs.description: Basic data about orders participated in the trade

eventSequenceNo.description: Sequence number for tracking received ticker events.

deleted.description: A flag that indicates if this trade should no longer be visible on the market (old trade).

mediumDisplayName.description: A medium length display name for the contract.
